verse:
नैवं विभोऽसुराणां ते प्रदेयः पद्मसम्भव ।
वरः क्रूरनिसर्गाणामहीनाममृतं यथा ॥
meaning: ब्रह्मा ऐसा बर नहीं दिया करो राक्षसों को, ब्रह्मा को कहना पड़ा महाराज गल्ती हो गई

terms.śrī-bhagavān uvāca: the Supreme Personality of Godhead replied (to Brahmā)
terms.padma-sambhava: O Lord Brahmā, born from the lotus flower
terms.krūra-nisargāṇām: persons who are by nature very cruel and jealous

vedabase.translation: The Personality of Godhead replied: My dear Lord Brahmā, O great lord born from the lotus flower, just as it is dangerous to feed milk to a snake, so it is dangerous to give benedictions to demons, who are by nature ferocious and jealous. I warn you not to give such benedictions to any demon again.

terms.पद्मसम्भव (padmasambhava): O lotus-born one (referring to Lord Brahma)

bard.meaning: Overall meaning: Śrī Bhagavān said, "O Vibho, do not give the boon of immortality to the cruel by nature and wicked demons."
